Aubergine Parmigiana

Aubergine Parmigiana

Prep: 20m

Cook: 40m

Total: 1h

Perfect time for this beauty of a dish. Aubergine parmigiana sits high on my list of death row meals. It’s one of life’s great pleasures. Layers of caramelised aubergine with mozzarella, tomato sauce, basil and Parmesan baked slowly into rich and melting. Pure heaven.

Ingredients

66 servings

Instructions

Notes
